00020 #ifndef MCOMPOSITEWINDOWGROUP_H
00021 #define MCOMPOSITEWINDOWGROUP_H
00022 
00023 #include <mcompositewindow.h>
00024 
00025 class MTexturePixmapItem;
00026 class MCompositeWindowGroupPrivate;
00027 
00028 class MCompositeWindowGroup: public MCompositeWindow
00029 {
00030     Q_OBJECT        
00031  public: 
00032     enum { Type =  UserType + 2 };
00033 
00034     MCompositeWindowGroup(MTexturePixmapItem* mainWindow);
00035     virtual ~MCompositeWindowGroup();
00036     
00037     bool addChildWindow(MTexturePixmapItem* window);
00038     void removeChildWindow(MTexturePixmapItem* window);
00039     MCompositeWindow *topWindow() const;
00040     GLuint texture();
00041     
00043     virtual void windowRaised();
00044     virtual void updateWindowPixmap(XRectangle *rects = 0, int num = 0, 
00045                                     Time = 0);
00046     virtual void saveBackingStore();
00047     virtual void resize(int , int);
00048     virtual void clearTexture();
00049     virtual bool isDirectRendered() const;
00050     virtual QRectF boundingRect() const;
00051     virtual void paint(QPainter*, const QStyleOptionGraphicsItem*, QWidget*);
00052     virtual Pixmap windowPixmap() const { return 0; }
00054     
00055     virtual int type () const { return Type; }
00056        
00057  private slots:
00058     void q_removeWindow();
00059     void mainWindowDestroyed();
00060 
00061  private:
00062     Q_DECLARE_PRIVATE(MCompositeWindowGroup)       
00063     void init();
00064     virtual MTexturePixmapPrivate* renderer() const;
00065     
00066     QScopedPointer<MCompositeWindowGroupPrivate> d_ptr;
00067 };
